title: My skin disappeared?
body: I was gifted project fiora a while back, I try playing her today and it's locked. please help.

replies.body: i lost woad king darius that i just got from a friend
Lol i actually came here because I also lost woad king darius
Lost my Crimson Riven skin yesterday and Sherwood Ashe a while back.

I lost my skin on Fiora that I just got from loot case
Riot Please help me..
I lost all my skins I had as well, only 2 remain... plz fix this RIOT!!!

I'd be unsettled if I realized a skin of mine is missing, so we'd like to take a closer look into this with you.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can figure out what happened and offer context.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
i had popstar ahri from a friend but when i wanted to play today is gone
i lost my deep sea nami and koi nami and nami i also lost bard plz help me riot

im also missing skins. 1 is the akali soccer skin(i just recently got it from the discount card that you get for your account--that show up randomly over the year) and there was another but i cant remember off the top of my head.
